title: Handle 'Do Not Disturb' Status
description: A housekeeper arrives at a room to clean it but sees the 'Do Not Disturb' sign on the door.

tasks.description: The housekeeper respects the sign and does not enter the room.
The housekeeper updates the room status in their device to 'Do Not Disturb'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The room status is accurately reflected in the system.

tasks.description: The housekeeper continues to the next room on their list and will check back on the DND room later in their shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: The workflow is adjusted according to policy.
